block.p: As every patient knows, the phrase ''over the counter'' means medicine for headaches, colds and the like. But with two drug makers seeking to make their cholesterol-fighting pills available without a prescription, the Food and Drug Administration began reexamining its over-the-counter drug policy. At issue is whether patients can manage chronic conditions, like osteoporosis and high blood pressure, without a doctor's supervision.
